Title: Allows qualified voters who are primary caregivers of one or more individuals to vote by absentee ballot
Summary: Allows qualified voters who are primary caregivers of one or more individuals to vote by absentee ballot regardless of whether the individuals cared for are ill or physically disabled.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to allowing qualified voters who are primary caregivers of one or more individuals to vote by absentee ballot
